name: Candlelight Yoga
description: Join us on Thursday evening for an intimate candlelight yoga session, limited to just 6 participants. This class blends Hatha, Ashtanga, and Kriya yoga, creating a relaxing and mindful practice that will help you release tension, find balance, and connect with your inner self.

name: Sunday Morning Yoga Flow
description: Join us on Sunday morning for a dynamic yoga class led by Lisa in English. This class blends Hatha, Ashtanga, and Kriya yoga, offering a well-rounded practice that helps you build strength, flexibility, and inner peace.

name: Sunday morning yoga class
description: Join our Sunday morning yoga class from 10am–11am in Rosenau park this summer, followed by breakfast at a local cafe.

name: Thursday evening yoga class
description: Join us every Thursday evening from 7:30pm–8:30pm at Wöhrder Wiese for an all-levels class.

name: Saturday morning yoga class
description: Start your weekend with intention and presence at our Saturday morning yoga class in Nuremberg Stadtpark.

name: Wednesday evening yoga class (Russian)
description: Join us on Wednesday evening from 19:30 to 20:30 in Nuremberg for an energy-boosting yoga class in the fresh air.

name: Evolve Energise | Hatha Yoga with Ānshū
description: Join us on Thursday, May 29 for our last studio yoga class of the season from 10:30am–11:30am for a mindful practice to help you move, breathe, and connect.

name: Evolve Strength | Adho Yoga with Olga
description: Join us this Sunday from 10am–11am in Rosenau Park for an energising outdoor yoga class with Olga.
location: Rosenau Park, Bleichstraße, 90429 Nürnberg, Meet at Cafe Kiosk

name: Yoga Workshop
description: Yoga workshop as part of the Open Beatz Festival
